titleStmt.title: The sermon preached before the King, at VVhitehall, on Tuesday the eight of Ianuarie, 1604. By Anthony Maxey Bachelar in Diuinity and chaplaine to his Maiestie
titleStmt.author: Maxey, Anthony, d. 1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Humphrey Lownes, for Clement Knight, and are to be sould at his shoppe in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Holy Lambe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Holy Lambe
